text.0: What difference does advanced search make in Open Source Investigations? What are the recommended tools needed to navigate social media investigation? Read here: https://t.co/VSLUGZIZWb #DubawaChecks
text.1:
The claim that the gold deposits in Zamfara State belong to Zamfara State is false. The federal government has ownership of all minerals according to the Nigeria Minerals and Mining Act of  2007. Read the full #FactCheck here: https://t.co/164UM4vP00
#DubawaChecks
text.2: Is it  true that the Federal Government allocated ₦380 billion in the 2021 Budget Proposal for the prosecution of Boko Haram suspects while ASUU was given ₦20 billion to revitalize 90 public universities in Nigeria? Read the facts here: https://t.co/d5bxLazsTL #DubawaChecks
